item.title: Bitcoin Knots 28.1.knots20250305 released
item.description:
Bitcoin Knots version 28.1.knots20250305 is now available for download.

This release includes new features, various bug fixes, and performance improvements.

Please report bugs using the issue tracker at GitHub.

See the release notes for more information about this release.
